title.rendered: “Remembering Our Heroes: Fallen IDF Soldier Identified, Latest Updates on Injured Personnel from Ephraim Brigade”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson about the name of a fallen IDF soldier whose notification has been delivered to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC2303202415401

Attached is a link to the IDF website, where the details and photos of the fallen are published and updated: https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, at an event in the Ephraim Brigade yesterday (Friday), an officer and a soldier from the Ram Battalion were seriously injured, and five more soldiers were lightly and moderately injured.

In a battle in the northern Gaza Strip, a reserve combat officer serving as a field investigator in Unit 504 was seriously injured yesterday (Friday).
